sent_1.text: METHODS : This study , which was conducted by the North Central Cancer Treatment Group , evaluated 42 patients who were asymptomatic and had manifested , progressive prostate specific antigen ( PSA ) elevation with hormone therapy .

entity_2.text: progressive prostate specific antigen ( PSA ) elevation

sent_2.text: Continued use of luteinizing hormone-releasing hormone agonist was permitted ; however , patients were ineligible if they had received other treatments for their disease in the preceding 4 weeks or if they had received a long - acting antiandrogen therapy in the preceding 6 weeks .

sent_3.text: Patients were instructed to take 6 grams of green tea per day orally in 6 divided doses .

sent_4.text: Each dose contained 100 calories and 46 mg of caffeine .

sent_5.text: Patients were monitored monthly for response and toxicity .
